results.description: Telegram Bot API token for sending notifications
Telegram chat ID for target notification channel
results.note: Can be derived from user ID 'scoobyjava' or phone number 949-424-4026

summary.text: Telegram secrets matrix: TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN provided by CEO, TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID needs derivation from user info

next_actions.action: Add TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN to GitHub Actions secrets

options: Use phone number 949-424-4026 to get chat ID
Start conversation with bot to get chat ID programmatically

github_secrets_commands: Add TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=(provided value) to GitHub Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions
Add TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID=(derived from user info) to GitHub Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions
